name: file_comment_edited
long_desc: My Slack API Start herenew App features Messaging Reference Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Resources Community A file comment was edited Compatibility: RTM Events API  This event is no longer served. File comments have been phased out in favor of regular messages and threads—read our changelog entry for more information. The file_comment_edited event is sent when a file comment is edited. It is sent to all connected clients for users who can see the file. Clients can use this notification to update comments in real-time for open files. The file property includes the file ID, as well as a top-level file_id. To obtain additional information about the file, use the files.info API method.
